description.value:
Major Boon You become a friend to the land. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Plants] as a divine innate spell.

When you are in a healthy natural environment, the land sustains you without need for food or drink.

You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Commune] ritual without any secondary casters or secondary checks.
